sn4.14:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati ekasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme.
sn4.14:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.14:5.2: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.14:5.3: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkameyyaṃ vicakkhukammāyā”ti.
sn4.14:5.4: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.14:8.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
